levels.description: Immediately gains <@ba.vup>{cost}</> DP, Muelsyse and her Flowing Shapes gain <@ba.vup>+{atk:0%}</> ATK; if Flowing Shape is in Melee form, it recovers <@ba.vup>{hp_recovery_per_sec_by_max_hp_ratio:0%}</> HP every second and gains <@ba.vup>{damage_resistance:0%}</> <$ba.protect>Sanctuary</>, if Flowing Shape is in Ranged form, its attacks hit <@ba.vup>twice</> at random targets within attack range
